text: Hazaristan or Hazarajat (Dari Persian: ) is a large mountainous area in the central highlands of Afghanistan which is the main and the historical land of the Hazara people. Hazaristan areas including provinces such as Bamyan, Daykundi, Ghor, Ghazni, Urozgan, Maidan Wardak, Parwan, Samangan, Baghlan, Badghis and some other areas. == Related pages == * Hazara people * Afghanistan == References == Category:Geography of Afghanistan
title: Hazaristan
